# init(data:isTemplate:displayStyle:)

**Initializer**

Creates an image from the specified data, specifying the display style.

## Declaration

```swift
init(data: Data, isTemplate: Bool? = nil, displayStyle: DisplayRepresentation.Image.DisplayStyle)
```
title: init(data:isTemplate:displayStyle:)
